subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
Rap Music
lead_paragraph: Barry Bonds has sauntered to the plate more than 12,500 times in his major league career, but he says that he has never selected the songs that have followed his footsteps.
snippet: Barry Bonds has sauntered to the plate more than 12,500 times in his major league career, but he says that he has never selected the songs that have followed his footsteps.
